metadata.title: CVE-2018-6521 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The sqlauth module in SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 relies on the MySQL utf8charset, which truncates queries upon encountering four-byte characters.There might be a scenario in which this allows remote attackers to bypassintended access restrictions.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
